context_bundle.summary: WoW performance optimization: HPET disable, CPU affinity, MSI mode, VRAM preloading via CVARs, addon profiling. The game is CPU-bound due to single-threaded LUA.

onboarding.quick_start: 1) Disable HPET 2) Set CPU affinity Core 1 for WoW 3) Max prerendered frames=1 4) Preload textures via CVARs 5) Profile addons for CPU hogs
common_patterns: # WoW CPU bottleneck: Single-threaded main loop, LUA runs on main thread, barely uses >2 cores
# VRAM preload: Use CVARs worldPreloadNonCritical, preloadStreamedData to front-load at loading screen
# Addon profiling: /script print(GetAddOnCPUUsage('AddonName')) - find OnUpdate abusers
# MSI mode: Only enable on specific devices (USB/WiFi), GPU MSI can conflict with audio
known_errors: Bartender was using 2.6% CPU due to OnUpdate every frame - replace with Dominos or UltraBar
16GB VRAM prevents spillover to system RAM, reducing page faults
With addons, cities/raids are CPU-bound regardless of GPU
